name: Shadow (itch) (CodyBowyer)
description:
30 week project
11th October 2021 - 5th May 2022
Extended Engines Project
Solo
Roles: 2D Art, Programming, Audio Implementation

In a 2D world, a powerful orb shocks the Day, splitting up reality into day and night. The two characters Day and Night must work together to find the orb and return the world back to normal.

In this game the player will have the ability to move both characters in the same direction, but only the selected character on the top will have the ability to jump. Switching characters will swap between day and night, allowing the player to complete puzzles to navigate through the level.
